name: SavvyQ
tag_list: deal, save-money, discount, half-price, best-deal, dallas-deal
overview:
SavvyQ is a great new deal marketplace that brings consumers and businesses together.

We offer the hot deals you love every day, and have a unique feature to let you show businesses what services you love and where your interests are, we call them “Queues”.

Our revolutionary Queue system lets you tell businesses what you want, and gives you a head start on any deals offered in that category so you can decide if it’s just what you’re looking for. This means less unwanted daily spam in your inbox for deals you aren’t interested in. With SavvyQ the power to save is in your hands, and you can bring the best deals on services you love straight to your inbox. Best of all, the consumer account is completely FREE to use.

Let’s Get Savvy!
